items.text: Ryan! Look who's here!
items.meaning: 라이언! 이게 대체 누구야?

items.text: Good to see you. What a small world.
items.meaning: 반가워. 세상 참 좁구나.

items.text: Long time no see. How have you been?
items.meaning: 오랜만이야. 어떻게 지냈어?

items.text: I'm doing great. You haven’t changed a bit.
items.meaning: 잘 지내고 있어. 넌 하나도 안 변했구나.

items.text: Nice talking to you. Say hello to your wife.
items.meaning: 대화 즐거웠어. 와이프한테 안부 전해 줘.

items.text: Catch you later. I'll keep in touch.
items.meaning: 나중에 봐. 내가 연락할게.

items.text: I got something for your birthday.
items.meaning: 네 생일 선물로 뭘 좀 샀어.

items.text: A present for me? You shouldn't have!
items.meaning: 내 선물이라고? 이러지 않아도 되는데!

items.text: It's cold outside. I'll give you a ride home.
items.meaning: 바깥 날씨가 추워. 집까지 태워줄게.

items.text: Don't bother, but thanks anyway.
items.meaning: 일부러 그럴 것 없어. 어쨌든 고마워.

items.text: Don’t mention it. That's what friends are for.
items.meaning: 별말을 다 하네. 친구 좋다는 게 뭐야.

items.text: Something smells fishy. Just be yourself.
items.meaning: 뭔가 수상한데. 평소처럼 해.

items.text: What's the weather gonna be like this Saturday?
items.meaning: 이번 주 토요일 날씨가 어떨 것 같아?

items.text: The weather reporter said it was gonna be raining.
items.meaning: 일기예보에서 비가 올 거라고 했어.

items.text: I get the feeling that we should call off our trip.
items.meaning: 여행을 취소해야 할 것 같은 느낌이 들어.

items.text: Boy! It totally slipped my mind.
items.meaning: 이런! 깜빡 잊고 있었네.

items.text: Don't tell me you were going to go alone behind my back.
items.meaning: 설마 나 몰래 혼자 가려고 했던 건 아니겠지.

items.text: No way. I'll just go with the flow.
items.meaning: 말도 안 돼. 난 그냥 대세를 따를 거야.

items.text: I feel like going out with you tonight.
items.meaning: 오늘밤에 너랑 놀러 가고 싶어.

items.text: I'm sorry, but I have a previous engagement.
items.meaning: 미안한데 난 선약이 있어.

items.text: Nothing beats beer with chicken on a hot day.
items.meaning: 이렇게 더운 날엔 치맥보다 나은 게 없지.

items.text: Come to think of it, I can't miss a drinking session.
items.meaning: 생각해 보니, 내가 술자리를 놓치면 안 되지.

items.text: That's it! You might as well cancel your appointment.
items.meaning: 바로 그거야! 너 약속 취소하는 게 낫겠다.

items.text: I'm gonna have to postpone it for another day.
items.meaning: 약속을 다른 날짜로 옮겨야겠어.

items.text: How did you get those plane tickets?
items.meaning: 비행기 티켓 어떻게 구했어?

items.text: I pulled some strings. I have good connections.
items.meaning: 내가 백을 좀 썼지. 좋은 인맥이 좀 있거든.

items.text: I knew it. Care for some coffee after lunch?
items.meaning: 그럴 줄 알았어. 점심 먹고 커피 한잔 어때?

items.text: You're a big fan of coffee. Go easy on it.
items.meaning: 커피 정말 좋아하는구나. 적당히 좀 마셔.

items.text: It's not gonna kill you to have one.
items.meaning: 한 잔 마신다고 큰일 나는 거 아니잖아.

items.text: Don't forget to bring Anna.
items.meaning: 안나 데려오는 거 잊지 말고.

items.text: Sorry to keep you waiting. So where were we?
items.meaning: 기다리게 해서 미안해요. 어디까지 얘기했죠?

items.text: We need to fix the date for the next meeting.
items.meaning: 다음 미팅 날짜를 확정해야 해요.

items.text: When is the most convenient time for you?
items.meaning: 언제가 가장 편한 시간이죠?

items.text: Too bad I'm not able to make time this week.
items.meaning: 안타깝게도 이번 주는 시간을 낼 수가 없어요.

items.text: Try to look on the bright side.
items.meaning: 긍정적으로 생각하도록 노력해봐요.

items.text: Got it. Keep me posted on your progress.
items.meaning: 알았어요. 진행 상황을 계속 알려 줘요.

items.text: I'm calling to make a reservation at seven.
items.meaning: 7시에 예약하려고 전화 드렸어요.

items.text: How many in your party, sir?
items.meaning: 일행이 몇 분이신가요?

items.text: Do you have a room for six?
items.meaning: 6명 방이 있나요?

items.text: It makes no difference whether you book or not.
items.meaning: 예약을 하시든 안 하시든 차이가 없어요.

items.text: What do you mean?
items.meaning: 무슨 뜻이죠?

items.text: You'll be admitted on a first-com first-served basis.
items.meaning: 선착순으로 입장 시켜 드리거든요.

items.text: Can you give me a hand with this?
items.meaning: 이것 좀 도와줄래?

items.text: I'd love to, but I'm too busy.
items.meaning: 그러고 싶은데 너무 바빠.

items.text: How come you're good at making excuses?
items.meaning: 넌 왜 그렇게 핑계 대기 선수니?

items.text: Don't take it out on me.
items.meaning: 나한테 화풀이 하지 마.

items.text: All you have to do is just say yes.
items.meaning: 넌 이렇게만 하면 돼. '알았어'

items.text: You have to do it yourself to improve your ability.
items.meaning: 네 능력을 키우려면 스스로 해야 해.

items.text: I'm going camping this weekend. Want to come along?
items.meaning: 이번 주말에 캠핑 가려고 하는데, 같이 갈래요?

items.text: Why not? Can I get you anything?
items.meaning: 물론이죠. 뭘 가져갈까요?

items.text: Just bring yourself. I'll take care of everything.
items.meaning: 그냥 몸만 오세요. 제가 다 알아서 할게요.

items.text: I've been wanting to hit the road for a change lately.
items.meaning: 요즘 기분 전환 삼아 좀 떠나고 싶었어요.

items.text: That's great! I'm also looking forward to this trip.
items.meaning: 잘됐네요! 저도 이번 여행을 고대하고 있어요.

items.text: I wouldn't miss it for anything.
items.meaning: 무슨 일이 있어도 갈게요.

items.text: My boss is not easy to get along with.
items.meaning: 우리 사장님은 함께 지내기가 쉽지 않아.

items.text: What is it? Spit it out.
items.meaning: 뭐 때문에? 말해 봐.

items.text: He's two-faced and getting out of hand.
items.meaning: 그분은 이중적이고 갈수록 감당이 안 돼.

items.text: You're annoyed by his constant complaints.
items.meaning: 끊임없는 불평 때문에 짜증스럽다며.

items.text: He's in a bad mood for some reason today.
items.meaning: 오늘도 무슨 이유인지 기분이 안 좋으셔.

items.text: The thing is you're not cut out to kiss up to him.
items.meaning: 네가 아부에 소질이 없는 것도 문제야.

items.text: Please don't give me a hard time.
items.meaning: 나 좀 힘들게 하지 마세요.

items.text: It's not like I asked you to marry me or what.
items.meaning: 당신에게 결혼해 달라고 한 것도 아니잖아요.

items.text: You just occasionally wanna have coffee or lunch?
items.meaning: 가끔 커피나 점심 먹자는 것뿐이에요?

items.text: I hope we can get back together again.
items.meaning: 우리가 다시 시작할 수 있기를 바라요.

items.text: How could you cheat on me for that long?
items.meaning: 어떻게 그렇게 오래 바람을 피울 수가 있어요?

items.text: I must admit, I've crossed the line.
items.meaning: 솔직히 제가 좀 심했어요.

items.text: I'd like to put my car on the market.
items.meaning: 내 차를 시장에 내 놓으려고 해.

items.text: Are you sure? What’s the deal?
items.meaning: 정말이야? 대체 무슨 일인데?

items.text: We don't need two cars anymore.
items.meaning: 더 이상 자동차가 두 대나 필요 없잖아.

items.text: What if you have the car, and I have to go shopping?
items.meaning: 만약 당신이 차를 쓰고 있는데 내가 쇼핑 가야 되면 어떡해?

items.text: We need to cut back on shopping.
items.meaning: 우린 쇼핑을 좀 줄여야 해.

items.text: Honey, I think you should just calm down a little bit.
items.meaning: 자기야, 당신 잠시 진정 좀 해야 할 것 같아.

items.text: I'm gonna have my friend over tonight.
items.meaning: 오늘 밤에 친구를 집에 초대하려고.

items.text: What's the occasion? He's a friend from school?
items.meaning: 무슨 일인데? 학교 친구니?

items.text: Yes, the real good kind. We have a lot in common.
items.meaning: 네, 정말 좋은 친구죠. 우린 공통점이 참 많아요.

items.text: You can't tell me something like this on such short notice.
items.meaning: 그런 일을 그렇게 갑자기 얘기하면 안 되지.

items.text: Mom, please don't tell me what to do.
items.meaning: 엄마, 제발 잔소리 좀 하지 마세요.

items.text: He's not coming. Over my dead body!
items.meaning: 친구는 못 와. 절대로 안 돼!

items.text: I'm not feeling well today, so I called in sick.
items.meaning: 오늘 몸이 좀 안 좋아서 병가 냈어.

items.text: I think you should take a few days off.
items.meaning: 너 며칠 쉬어야 할 것 같아.

items.text: I'd like to. Thanks for your concern.
items.meaning: 그러고 싶어. 걱정해 줘서 고마워.

items.text: It’s like you've been working 24/7 these days.
items.meaning: 요즘 밤낮으로 일만 하는 것 같더라.

items.text: I don't want to work overtime, but it's the only way.
items.meaning: 야근하고 싶진 않은데, 방법이 없거든.

items.text: I'm telling you, nobody can stop you.
items.meaning: 정말이지, 아무도 못 말려.

items.text: Hey, What's up with your hair?
items.meaning: 야, 머리가 대체 왜 그래?

items.text: I overslept. My office dinner ended after midnight.
items.meaning: 늦잠 잤어.사무실 회식이 자정 넘어서 끝났거든.

items.text: You are supposed to make a presentation tomorrow.
items.meaning: 너 내일 프레젠테이션 하기로 되어 있잖아.

items.text: Can you help me with my work a little?
items.meaning: 내 업무 좀 도와줄 수 있어?

items.text: Okay. Let's go over your assignment first.
items.meaning: 그래, 먼저 과제물부터 검토해 보자.

items.text: Please book a meeting room in advance.
items.meaning: 회의실부터 미리 예약해 줘.

items.text: What are you gonna do this weekend?
items.meaning: 이번 주말에 뭐 할 거야?

items.text: I'll take my kids outside and play in the yard.
items.meaning: 애들 야외에 데리고 가서 뛰어 놀려고

items.text: Why don't we go catch a late-night movie tomorrow?
items.meaning: 내일 심야영화 한 편 볼까?

items.text: Sounds good, but I'm signing up for yoga class.
items.meaning: 좋은 생각인데, 요가 수강신청 하러 가야 해.

items.text: Once you make a decision, you stick to it.
items.meaning: 일단 결정하면 끝까지 밀고 가는구나.

items.text: The clock is ticking. It’s now or never.
items.meaning: 시간이 흐르잖아. 지금 아니면 기회가 없어.

items.text: I got a flat tire while dropping off my son at school.
items.meaning: 아들 학교 데려다 주다가 타이어 펑크가 났어.

items.text: Again? It happened two months ago.
items.meaning: 또? 두 달 전에도 그랬잖아.

items.text: Yeah, and now my car won't start. This is ridiculous.
items.meaning: 응, 게다가 시동도 안 걸려. 말도 안 돼.

items.text: Maybe you should call your insurance company.
items.meaning: 보험회사에 전화해야겠네.

items.text: I'm going to be a little late to work.
items.meaning: 출근이 조금 늦어질 것 같아.

items.text: OK. I'll tell your immediate supervisor.
items.meaning: 알았어. 네 상사에게 보고할게.

items.text: It's hard to reach you by phone.
items.meaning: 너랑 연락하기 정말 힘들다.

items.text: Sorry. I haven't had time to return calls.
items.meaning: 미안. 전화해 줄 시간이 없었어.

items.text: Do you remember we're going for a drink tonight?
items.meaning: 오늘 저녁에 술 약속한 거 기억하지?

items.text: Yes, but can I take a rain check?
items.meaning: 그래. 근데 다음 기회로 미루면 안 될까?

items.text: You can't break our promise this time.
items.meaning: 이번에는 약속 깨뜨리면 안 돼.

items.text: I'm booked solid today. My head's gonna explode.
items.meaning: 오늘 스케줄이 꽉 찼어. 머리가 터질 것 같아.

items.text: Could you come here a sec?
items.meaning: 잠깐만 이쪽으로 와 볼래?

items.text: Speak of the devil, what's up?
items.meaning: 호랑이도 제 말 하면 온다더니, 무슨 일이야?

items.text: Your boss is asking for the report.
items.meaning: 사장님이 보고서를 찾고 계셔.

items.text: One moment, I'll sneak out of the meeting.
items.meaning: 잠시만, 회의 중에 살짝 빠져나올게.

items.text: Look, it's almost 6. Time to call it a day.
items.meaning: 벌써 6시가 다 됐어. 마감할 시간이야.

items.text: Okay, I'll wrap things up in 5 minutes.
items.meaning: 알았어. 5분 내로 마무리할게.

items.text: It's like you worry about the kids too much.
items.meaning: 당신을 애들을 너무 걱정하는 것 같아

items.text: Don't be silly. There's a good reason for that.
items.meaning: 바보 같은 소리 마요. 그럴 이유가 있어요

items.text: When I was their age, I used to disappear for hours.
items.meaning: 내가 저 나이 땐 몇 시간씩 사라지곤 했어.

items.text: Times have changed. We can't take our eyes off them.
items.meaning: 세상이 변했어요. 애들한테서 눈을 떼면 안 돼요.

items.text: Okay, I will pay more attention.
items.meaning: 알았어. 좀 더 신경 쓸게.

items.text: Your room is a mess. Please help me clean it.
items.meaning: 당신 방이 엉망이에요. 청소하는 것 좀 도와줘요.

items.text: Have you ever committed any crimes?
items.meaning: 혹시 범죄를 저지른 적 있나요?

items.text: Absolutely not. I've never broken the law.
items.meaning: 물론 없죠. 법을 어겨 본 적이 없어요.

items.text: What if someone blackmails you into something?
items.meaning: 누가 당신에게 뭔가를 하라고 협박하면 어떻게 하실래요?

items.text: In that case, I'll report to the police.
items.meaning: 그런 경우엔, 전 경찰에 신고할거에요.

items.text: Actually, I'm in a real sticky situation.
items.meaning: 사실, 제가 정말 곤란한 상황에 처해있어요.

items.text: Not to worry. I'll keep an eye on you.
items.meaning: 걱정 마세요. 제가 지켜봐 줄게요.

items.text: Let's go for a drive after the movie.
items.meaning: 영화 끝나고 드라이브 가자

items.text: Sure. What movies are playing now?
items.meaning: 물론. 무슨 영화가 상영 중이지?

items.text: Have you seen 'Interview' by any chance?
items.meaning: 혹시 '인터뷰' 본 적 있어?

items.text: I thought it would be good, but was taken in by the ad.
items.meaning: 난 재밌을거라 생각했는데, 광고에 속은 거였어.

items.text: You're not allowed to tell me the story.
items.meaning: 나한테 스토리 얘기하면 안 돼.

items.text: Got it. Hurry up, or we’ll be late.
items.meaning: 알았어. 서두르자. 안 그럼 우리 늦을 거야.

items.text: I want to see if she wants to come back.
items.meaning: 그녀가 돌아오고 싶어 하는지 알고 싶어.

items.text: After splitting up, it's good to go your separate ways.
items.meaning: 헤어진 후엔, 각자 길을 가는 게 좋아.

items.text: Should I give back the things she got me?
items.meaning: 그녀가 나한테 사 준 물건을 돌려줘야 할까?

items.text: Just throw them away. What's the point of keeping them?
items.meaning: 그냥 버려. 보관하고 있는 게 무슨 소용이야?

items.text: I have no idea how I can get over her.
items.meaning: 모르겠어. 내가 어떻게 그녀를 잊을 수 있을지.

items.text: I'll set you up with a nice girl from my class.
items.meaning: 내가 우리 반에 멋진 여자친구 한 명 소개시켜 줄게.

items.text: Are you sure this is what you want to do?
items.meaning: 이게 정말 당신이 원한 거 확실해요?

items.text: Don't you get it? I have made that clear.
items.meaning: 이해 안 돼요? 난 분명히 말했어요.

items.text: I hate to say this, but you're dead wrong.
items.meaning: 이런 말하기 싫지만, 당신이 완전히 틀렸어요.

items.text: If you don't trust me, count me out.
items.meaning: 날 믿지 못할 거라면, 날 빼 주세요.

items.text: Oh, no. Here we go again.
items.meaning: 아이고, 또 시작이군요.

items.text: What I want you to do is take some action.
items.meaning: 내가 당신에게 원하는 건, 무슨 조치를 취하는 거에요.

items.text: I owe you an apology. I forgot your birthday.
items.meaning: 너한테 사과할 게 있어. 네 생일을 잊었네.

items.text: Come on. Let it go.
items.meaning: 에이. 내버려 둬 (잊어버려)

items.text: I promise it'll never happen again.
items.meaning: 다시는 이런 일 없을 거라 약속해.

items.text: No problem. It could happen to anyone.
items.meaning: 괜찮아. 누구나 그럴 수 있어.

items.text: I want to make up for missing it.
items.meaning: (네 생일) 놓친 걸 보상하고 싶어.

items.text: Forget it. I don't want to twist your arm.
items.meaning: 잊어버려. 엎드려 절 받기는 사양할래.

items.text: Why are you in a hurry? Just slow down.
items.meaning: 왜 이렇게 서둘러요? 좀 천천히 해요.

items.text: I can't wait to get married and live with you.
items.meaning: 당신과 결혼해서 살고 싶어 못 참겠어요.

items.text: Just because we go out doesn't mean we have to get married.
items.meaning: 우리가 사귄다고 해서 우리가 결혼해야 하는 건 아니잖아요.

items.text: I see what you mean. Take whatever time you need.
items.meaning: 당신 무슨 뜻인지 알아요. 필요한 만큼 충분히 시간을 가져요.

items.text: Now you're talking.
items.meaning: 이제야 말이 통하네요.

items.text: People say that we're a good match.
items.meaning: 사람들이 우리가 잘 어울린다고 말해요.

items.text: You're all dressed up for the interview today.
items.meaning: 오늘 면접을 위해서 쫙 차려 입었구나.

items.text: You know what they say, "Clothes make the man."
items.meaning: 옷이 날개다' 라는 말 너도 알잖아.

items.text: It looks like you got a new suit.
items.meaning: 새 양복 장만한 것 같은데.

items.text: I haven't bought a new one in six years.
items.meaning: 나 6년 동안 새 것을 사 본 적이 없었지.

items.text: That's where you've changed. You used to wear wash-and-wear.
items.meaning: 그것이 네가 달라진 거구나. 넌 싸구려 옷만 입곤 했지.

items.text: Just drop it! Let's wait and see how the result comes out.
items.meaning: 그만 좀 해! 결과가 어떻게 나올지 기다려 보자.

items.text: Honey, what do you think of these sunglasses?
items.meaning: 자기야, 이 선글라스 어떻게 생각해?

items.text: You're going on a vacation or something?
items.meaning: 너 휴가 가려는 거야 뭐야?

items.text: Give me a break. I was just trying them out.
items.meaning: 한 번만 봐줘. 난 그냥 써보기만 하려는 거였어.

items.text: I'm gonna take our kids to the ice cream stand.
items.meaning: 난 애들을 아이스크림 매대에 데려갈게.

items.text: OK. Let's meet in the food court when I'm done.
items.meaning: 그래. 내 볼일 끝나면 푸드코트에서 만나.

items.text: Suit yourself. Don't buy anything on impulse.
items.meaning: 편한대로 해. 충동구매는 하지 마.

items.text: I can't remember a thing about last night.
items.meaning: 어젯밤 일은 하나도 기억이 안나.

items.text: Me, neither. I'm in the mood for a beer tonight.
items.meaning: 나도 그래. 저녁에 맥주 한 잔 하고 싶은 기분인 걸.

items.text: Again? I'm suffering from a terrible hangover.
items.meaning: 또? 난 숙취로 고생하고 있는데

items.text: Let's go get hangover soup before hitting the bars.
items.meaning: 술 마시러 가기 전에 해장국 먹으러 가자.

items.text: Perfect. Let's get wasted tonight.
items.meaning: 완벽해. 오늘 밤에 진탕 마셔 보자.

items.text: I'll get the bill this time.
items.meaning: 이번에는 내가 살게.

items.text: Our kids always fight over nothing.
items.meaning: 우리 애들은 항상 아무것도 아닌 일로 싸워.

items.text: It's no big deal. Never mind.
items.meaning: 별일 아니야. 신경 쓰지 마.

items.text: I agree with you to some degree, but I'm a little sensitive.
items.meaning: 나도 어느 정도는 너와 동의해. 그런데 내가 좀 예민한가 봐.

items.text: They have no trouble adjusting to school life?
items.meaning: 애들은 학교 생활에 적응하는 데 문제 없어?

items.text: Yes, I guess so.
items.meaning: 응, 그런 것 같아.

items.text: I bet they'll grow up to be great people.
items.meaning: 내가 장담하건대, 걔들은 훌륭한 사람이 될 거야.

items.text: Your skirt is way too short.
items.meaning: 너의 치마 길이가 너무 짧다.

items.text: What's wrong with it?
items.meaning: 뭐가 어때서요?

items.text: You're not wearing that to the party.
items.meaning: 너 파티에 그거 입고 못 간다.

items.text: Mom! You don't have an eye for fashion.
items.meaning: 엄마! 엄마는 패션 감각이 없어요.

items.text: You're impossible. You look good in everything.
items.meaning: 넌 구제불능이야. 넌 아무거나 입어도 잘 어울려.

items.text: Please stop! You never take my side at all.
items.meaning: 제발 그만요! 제 편은 절대 안 들어주시잖아요.

items.text: I had to stay up all night cramming for the finals.
items.meaning: 기말고사 준비로 벼락치기 하느라 밤을 꼬박 새워야 했어.

items.text: Now it's party time. Live it up.
items.meaning: 이제 파티 할 때야. 신나게 즐기자고.

items.text: Is it OK if I invite someone to the party?
items.meaning: 내가 누구 한 명 파티에 초대해도 괜찮을까?

items.text: As long as it's not Henry. He's such a party pooper.
items.meaning: 헨리만 아니면 돼. 그는 정말 분위기 깨는 녀석이거든.

items.text: OK. We might as well keep it a secret from him.
items.meaning: 좋아. 우리 그한테는 비밀로 하는 게 낫겠다.

items.text: Come on! Let's get a move on!
items.meaning: 자! 어서 서둘러야지!

items.text: Why did you hurt her feelings?
items.meaning: 왜 그녀 감정을 상하게 했어?

items.text: I didn't mean to.
items.meaning: 그럴 의도는 아니었어.

items.text: Watch your language and don't swear ever again.
items.meaning: 말 조심하고 다시는 욕하지 마.

items.text: I'm sorry. I'll keep that in mind.
items.meaning: 미안해. 명심할게.

items.text: How many times do I have to tell you the same thing?
items.meaning: 내가 너한테 같은 말을 몇 번이나 해야 하니?

items.text: I don't know what to say.
items.meaning: 뭐라고 할 말이 없다.

items.text: Are you attracted to her?
items.meaning: 너 그녀에게 끌리는 거니?

items.text: This is embarrassing, but I'm really into her.
items.meaning: 부끄럽지만, 나 그녀에게 정말 푹 빠졌어.

items.text: Don't even think about it. She's out of your league.
items.meaning: 꿈도 꾸지 마. 그녀는 너한테 과분해.

items.text: Is she seeing someone?
items.meaning: 그녀가 만나는 사람이 있어?

items.text: I'm sorry to say that she's already taken.
items.meaning: 말하기 그렇지만 그녀는 임자가 있어.

items.text: I'm just gonna ask her out. It won't hurt to try.
items.meaning: 그냥 데이트 신청이라도 해봐야 겠다. 손해 볼 건 없잖아.

items.text: How long will it take to get the shopping done?
items.meaning: 쇼핑 끝날 때 까지 얼마나 걸릴까?

items.text: I'm almost done. It'll just take a second.
items.meaning: 나 거의 다 됐어. 몇 초면 돼.

items.text: I've had it. My back is killing me.
items.meaning: 더 이상 못 참아. 허리 아파 죽겠어.

items.text: You'd better go get some rest in the lounge.
items.meaning: 너 휴게실 가서 좀 쉬는 게 낫겠다.

items.text: Two hours have passed in the blink of an eye.
items.meaning: 눈 깜짝할 사이에 두 시간이 지났어.

items.text: Cut me some slack, please.
items.meaning: 내 사정 좀 봐 줘, 제발.

items.text: Can you take out the garbage on your way out?
items.meaning: 나가는 길에 쓰레기 좀 버려 줄 수 있어?

items.text: No problem. I'll get it.
items.meaning: 문제 없어요. 가져 갈게요.

items.text: What are you planning to do after school?
items.meaning: 학교 끝나고 뭐할 계획이니?

items.text: I'm hanging out with my friends at the pizza place.
items.meaning: 친구들하고 피자 가게에서 놀려고요.

items.text: My car broke down. I need to get it fixed by tomorrow.
items.meaning: 내 차가 고장 났어. 내일까지 고쳐놓아야 해.

items.text: I'll see what I can do, but don't get your hopes up.
items.meaning: 제가 알아볼게요, 근데 너무 기대하진 마세요.

items.text: What took you so long?
items.meaning: 왜 이렇게 늦었어?

items.text: I got stuck in traffic near the City Hall.
items.meaning: 시청 근처에서 교통체증에 갇혀 있었어.

items.text: Traffic is heavy at this time of day.
items.meaning: 하루 중 이 시간은 교통이 혼잡해.

items.text: I got caught speeding yesterday.
items.meaning: 나 어제는 속도위반으로 걸렸다니까.

items.text: Nothing is working out for you these days.
items.meaning: 너 요즘에 되는 일이 없구나.

items.text: I've been through a lot in the past few weeks.
items.meaning: 지난 몇 주간 많은 일을 겪었지.

items.text: Anything good happen today?
items.meaning: 오늘 무슨 좋은 일 있어요?

items.text: Wow! How could you tell?
items.meaning: 와우! 그걸 어떻게 알았죠?

items.text: It's written all over your face.
items.meaning: 당신 얼굴에 다 쓰여 있어요.

items.text: My son got accepted to Harvard Business School.
items.meaning: 우리 아들이 하버드 경영대에 합격했어요.

items.text: That's good news. You deserve to take all the credit.
items.meaning: 좋은 소식이네요. 당신은 모든 공을 차지할 자격이 있어요.

items.text: Thanks. Everything is under control.
items.meaning: 고마워요. 모든 게 잘 진행되고 있어요.

items.text: Do you want insurance coverage?
items.meaning: 보험 들려고요?

items.text: Yes. I don't want to take a big risk.
items.meaning: 네. 큰 위험을 감수하고 싶지 않아요.

items.text: When is your baby due anyway?
items.meaning: 그나저나 언제가 출산 예정일이에요?

items.text: It's coming up. It's about 3 months away.
items.meaning: 곧 다가와요. 대략 3개월 남았어요.

items.text: Let's get together for lunch sometime.
items.meaning: 언제 점심 먹으러 함 만나요.

items.text: Sounds like a plane.
items.meaning: 좋은 생각이에요.

items.text: Please take me to this address.
items.meaning: 이 주소로 데려가 주세요.

items.text: Sure. If it's all right, I'd like to take a short cut.
items.meaning: 물론이죠. 괜찮으시다면 지름길로 가고 싶네요.

items.text: That's fine, but please step on it.
items.meaning: 좋아요, 하지만 속도를 내 주세요.

items.text: It'll take 20 minutes at this time.
items.meaning: 이 시간에는 20분 정도 걸릴 거에요.

items.text: Could you let me out over there?
items.meaning: 저기서 내려 주시겠어요?

items.text: All right. Here we are. Enjoy your stay.
items.meaning: 넵. 다 왔습니다. 즐거운 시간 되세요.

items.text: Why does she look so sad?
items.meaning: 그녀가 왜 슬퍼 보이지?

items.text: Probably because I made fun of her, so she was upset.
items.meaning: 아마 내가 그녀를 놀려서 그녀가 화났나 봐.

items.text: What did you say?
items.meaning: 너 뭐라고 말했는데?

items.text: Gold digger. That's what people say.
items.meaning: 돈만 밝히는 여자. 사람들이 그러던데.

items.text: I think you've got her wrong.
items.meaning: 내 생각엔 네가 그녀를 오해한 것 같다.

items.text: I think I'm gonna call her back and apologize.
items.meaning: 내 생각엔 내가 그녀에게 전화해서 사과해야겠다.

items.text: Wow! Your English score went up.
items.meaning: 와우! 너의 영어 점수가 올랐네.

items.text: I wasn't sure about a few questions, so I took a guess.
items.meaning: 몇 문제는 확실치 않아서, 대충 찍었어.

items.text: How did you get such a great score?
items.meaning: 어떻게 그렇게 좋은 점수를 받았어?

items.text: The key is to put everything aside and study.
items.meaning: 비결은 만사를 제쳐 두고 공부하는 거지.

items.text: I tried everything, but nothing worked.
items.meaning: 난 모든 노력을 다했는데, 효과가 없네.

items.text: That's hard to believe. You're all talk.
items.meaning: 믿을 수 없어. 넌 항상 말뿐이잖아.

items.text: Are you learning English these days?
items.meaning: 너 요즘 영어 배우고 있니?

items.text: I just started. I think it'll help with my future.
items.meaning: 나 막 시작했어. 내 생각엔 내 미래에 도움이 될 것 같아.

items.text: It'll probably take a while before you get fluent.
items.meaning: 네가 유창해질 때 까지 시간이 좀 걸릴 거야.

items.text: Now that you mention it, I'm getting cold feet.
items.meaning: 네가 그렇게 말하니까, 긴장되는 걸.

items.text: No worries. They say "Well begun is half done."
items.meaning: 걱정 마. "시작이 반이다" 라는 말도 있잖아.

items.text: I go along with that.
items.meaning: 동감이야.

items.text: Why the upset tone in your voice?
items.meaning: 너 왜 화난 목소리야?

items.text: Our wedding photos are all messed up.
items.meaning: 우리 결혼 사진이 완전 엉망진창이 됐어.

items.text: Good thing we didn't pay for it yet.
items.meaning: 우리 아직 결제를 안해서 다행이야.

items.text: I chose this studio because I heard it was popular.
items.meaning: 여기가 인기 있다고 들어서 이 스튜디오를 선택한 건데

items.text: You must have really freaked out.
items.meaning: 너 정말로 기겁했나 보구나

items.text: I'm sick of complaining about this.
items.meaning: 이런 걸로 불평하는 거 질렸어.

items.text: What brings you here?
items.meaning: 여긴 어쩐 일이세요?

items.text: I was in the neighborhood and came by.
items.meaning: 근처에 왔다가 들렀어요.

items.text: Great. I'm so glad you came here.
items.meaning: 잘했어요. 방문해 줘서 정말 기뻐요.

items.text: I'm starving. Have you had lunch?
items.meaning: 배가 많이 고파요. 점심은 드셨어요?

items.text: No. Let's go grab a bite to eat.
items.meaning: 아뇨. 나가서 간단히 뭐 좀 먹죠.

items.text: Do  you have a favorite hangout around here?
items.meaning: 이 근처에 단골집이 있나요?

items.text: When was the last time you got a medical checkup?
items.meaning: 언제 마지막으로 건강검진을 했나요?

items.text: Two months ago. I get it at my company every year.
items.meaning: 두 달 전이요. 매년 회사에서 해요.

items.text: How did it go this time?
items.meaning: 이번엔 어떻게 나왔어요?

items.text: Not good. My blood pressure went up a bit.
items.meaning: 좋진 않아요. 혈압이 조금 올라갔어요.

items.text: You've been under a lot of stress lately.
items.meaning: 최근에 스트레스를 받아왔잖아요.

items.text: I should take good care of my health.
items.meaning: 건강을 더 각별히 돌봐야겠어요.

items.text: Can you help me with my math homework?
items.meaning: 내 수학 숙제 좀 도와줄 수 있어?

items.text: Sorry, I can't. My hands are full.
items.meaning: 미안하지만 안 되겠어. 지금 좀 바빠.

items.text: Math tests are not what they used to be.
items.meaning: 수학시험이 예전 같지 않아.

items.text: What can I say? You have to get used to it.
items.meaning: 어떻겠어? 네가 적응하는 수 밖에

items.text: Math is not my thing, but English is my favorite.
items.meaning: 수학은 내 취향이 아니지만, 영어는 좋아해.

items.text: If so, you should play to your strengths.
items.meaning: 그렇다면, 나 강점을 발휘해봐.

items.text: My stomach feels heavy from indigestion.
items.meaning: 소화가 안 돼서 속이 더부룩해.

items.text: You shouldn't have eaten so much at the buffet.
items.meaning: 너 뷔페에서 그렇게 많이 먹지 말아야 했어.

items.text: You talked me into going there.
items.meaning: 네가 거기 가자고 설득했잖아.

items.text: Don't blame me for your eating too much.
items.meaning: 네가 과식한 걸 내 탓으로 돌리지 마.

items.text: I need to go on a diet or something.
items.meaning: 난 다이어트든 뭐든 할 필요가 있어.

items.text: I can't take it anymore. I hate the way you talk.
items.meaning: 더 이상 못 참겠어. 나는 네 말투가 싫어.

items.text: Look at this. I've got goose bumps all over.
items.meaning: 이것 좀 봐. 나 온몸에 소름 돋았어.

items.text: It's getting pretty chilly in the morning.
items.meaning: 아치 날씨가 점점 쌀쌀해지고 있어.

items.text: I'm freezing to death. You should bundle up when going out.
items.meaning: 추워 죽겠다. 너 외출할 때 껴입어야겠다.

items.text: I had an accident dozing off behind the wheel.
items.meaning: 나 운전 중에 깜빡 졸다가 사고 났어.

items.text: Oh, no. Were you hurt?
items.meaning: 저런. 다쳤어?

items.text: Fortunately, it was just a fender-bender.
items.meaning: 다행히도, 경미한 접촉 사고였어.

items.text: Hello, Customer Service, Brown speaking.
items.meaning: 안녕하세요. 고객 관리부 브라운입니다.

items.text: This is Tom. Is Mr. Robison available?
items.meaning: 저는 톰입니다. 로빈슨씨 계신가요?

items.text: Hold on, please. He's stepped out for a moment.
items.meaning: 잠시만요. 잠시 자리 비우셨네요.

items.text: It's so hard to reach him. He was out of town last time.
items.meaning: 그분과 연락하기 참 힘드네요. 지난 번엔 출장을 가셨던데.

items.text: I'll tell him to get back to you when he gets in.
items.meaning: 돌아오시면 당신께 회신전화 드리라고 말씀 드릴게요.

items.text: It's almost lunch time. Maybe he's out to lunch.
items.meaning: 이제 거의 점심시간 이네요. 아마 점심 드시러 나가셨나 봐요.

items.text: What's up? You look exhausted.
items.meaning: 무슨 일이야? 너 지쳐 보인다.

items.text: I've been hooked on video games for the last few days.
items.meaning: 최근 며칠 동안 비디오 게임에 빠져 있었어.

items.text: How old are you? You should act your age.
items.meaning: 너 몇 살이야? 나잇값 좀 해야지.

items.text: Look who's talking. Mind your own business.
items.meaning: 사돈 남 말 하시네. 너나 잘 해.

items.text: Don't lecture me. I'll kick you ass.
items.meaning: 나한테 설교하지 마. 니 엉덩이 뻥찬다.(혼날 줄 알아)

items.text: OK. Let's just come to our senses.
items.meaning: 알았어. 우리 정신 좀 차리자.

items.text: The iPad5 is coming out next month.
items.meaning: 아이패드5가 다음 달에 출시된대.

items.text: Wow! I have to wait in line from early morning.
items.meaning: 와! 아침 일찍부터 줄 서야겠다.

items.text: Since when did you get interested in the latest gadgets?
items.meaning: 언제부터 최신기기에 관심을 가졌니?

items.text: I keep up with trends. I wasn't born yesterday.
items.meaning: 난 유행을 따라가고 있어. 나도 알 건 다 알아.

items.text: No offense, but you barely know how to use smart phones.
items.meaning: 악의는 없어, 근데 너 스마트폰 어떻게 쓰는 지도 거의 모르잖아.

items.text: Knock it off! You don't have to rub it in.
items.meaning: 그만 좀 해! 아픈데 좀 건드리지 마.

items.text: You'll never guess what happened last night.
items.meaning: 어젯밤 무슨 일이 벌어졌는지 넌 상상도 못할 거야.

items.text: What? She stood you up or what?
items.meaning: 뭔데? 그녀에게 바람이나 뭐 그런 거 맞은 거야?

items.text: Exactly. Don't you think she plays hard to get?
items.meaning: 정확해. 그녀가 너무 튕긴다고 생각지 않니?

items.text: I'm sure she really likes to play the field.
items.meaning: 확실히 그녀는 여러 사람과 사귀는 걸 좋아해.

items.text: According to rumors, she has feelings for you.
items.meaning: 소문에 그녀가 너한테 마음이 있다고 하던데.

items.text: I don't buy it. I have a lot on my mind.
items.meaning: 믿을 수 없어. 머리가 복잡해진다.

items.text: How old do I look?
items.meaning: 저 몇 살처럼 보여요?

items.text: Well, I thought you're in your mid-30s.
items.meaning: 글쎄요. 30대 중반이라고 생각했어요.

items.text: Actually, I'm pushing 40.
items.meaning: 사실, 전 곧 40이에요.

items.text: Really? You look young for your age.
items.meaning: 정말요? 나이에 비해 동안이네요.

items.text: Thanks. I get that a lot. What are you up for?
items.meaning: 고마워요. 그런 말 많이 들어요. 뭐 드시고 싶으세요?

items.text: Anything. I'm not picky about food.
items.meaning: 뭐든지요. 전 음식 안 가려요.

items.text: Is Jason off today? He's not answering the phone.
items.meaning: 제이슨 오늘 쉬는 날인가요? 그가 전화를 받질 않아요.

items.text: He has gone for the day for a family emergency.
items.meaning: 집에 급한 일이 생겨서 이미 퇴근했어요.

items.text: Thank you for the information.
items.meaning: 알려줘서 고마워요.

items.text: I’m in charge of this project, so you can tell me.
items.meaning: 제가 이 프로젝트 책임자에요. 그러니 저한테 말씀하세요.

items.text: Sorry to bother you, but can you do me a favor?
items.meaning: 귀찮게 해서 죄송한데, 부탁 하나 들어 줄래요?

items.text: Sure thing. What do you need?
items.meaning: 물론이죠. 뭐가 필요하세요?

items.text: Wake up, sleepyhead! You sleep in every day.
items.meaning: 일어나, 잠꾸러기! 넌 매일 늦잠이야.

items.text: I tossed and turned all night. I couldn't sleep a wink.
items.meaning: 나 밤새 뒤척였어요. 한숨도 못 잤어요.

items.text: I'm wondering if you can make it on time for school.
items.meaning: 난 네가 제 시간에 학교에 갈 수나 있을지 의문이다.

items.text: I'm in the middle of washing my hair already.
items.meaning: 전 이미 머리 감고 있는 중이에요.

items.text: You're the black sheep of our family.
items.meaning: 넌 우리 집 골칫덩이야.

items.text: Come on. I just forgot to set the alarm.
items.meaning: 아 쫌~. 전 단지 알람 맞추는 걸 잊은 거라고요.

items.text: I'm really out of shape. I keep on gaining weight.
items.meaning: 나 정말 몸매가 망가졌어. 나 계속 몸무게가 늘고 있어.

items.text: Speaking of which, I've started working out at the gym.
items.meaning: 말이 나와서 말인데, 나 헬스장에서 운동 시작했어.

items.text: Really? Maybe I should go on a crash diet.
items.meaning: 정말? 나도 속성 다이어트를 해야겠어.

items.text: Starving is not helpful. You should go by the book.
items.meaning: 굶는 건 도움이 안 돼. 너 원칙대로 해야 해.

items.text: Well, I don't know where to start.
items.meaning: 글쎄, 어디서부터 시작할 지 모르겠어.

items.text: Play it safe, start by joining the gym.
items.meaning: 신중히 해. 헬스장 다니는 것부터 시작해.

items.text: You look worried. What's bothering you?
items.meaning: 너 걱정 있어 보여. 뭐가 고민이야?

items.text: I think I'm feeling a little left out at work.
items.meaning: 내 생각에 내가 회사에서 왕따가 된 기분이야.

items.text: Don't be frustrated. Time heals all wounds.
items.meaning: 좌절하지 마. 시간이 약이야.

items.text: Will you back me up when I talk in the meeting?
items.meaning: 내가 회의에서 얘기할 때 네가 내 편 좀 들어줄래?

items.text: Don't worry. It's nothing.
items.meaning: 걱정 마. 별거 아니지.

items.text: I can't thank you enough.
items.meaning: 어떻게 고마워 해야 할 지 모르겠다. (정말 고마워)

items.text: How about a little hair of the dog?
items.meaning: 해장술 어때?

items.text: Sorry, but I think I'll pass tonight.
items.meaning: 미안하지만 오늘밤은 사양할게.

items.text: You promised to treat this time. You have a lot of nerve.
items.meaning: 이번엔 네가 사기로 약속했잖아. 너 참 뻔뻔하다.

items.text: Something urgent came up suddenly.
items.meaning: 갑자기 급한 일이 생겼거든.

items.text: You're so cheap and unreliable.
items.meaning: 너 정말 치사하고 믿을 수가 없어.

items.text: Sorry. I have a sore throat. Let's go out next week.
items.meaning: 미안. 목이 아파서 그래. 다음 주에 가자.

items.text: I haven't seen you around for a while.
items.meaning: 요즘 한 동안 니 얼굴을 못 봤네.

items.text: I'm between jobs. So I've been lying low.
items.meaning: 구직 중이거든. 그래서 잠수 탔어.

items.text: Don't work too hard and take your time.
items.meaning: 너무 무리 하지 말고 쉬엄쉬엄 해.

items.text: It's like beating my head against the wall.
items.meaning: 마치 맨 땅에 헤딩하는 것 같아.

items.text: I think you're kind of a late bloomer.
items.meaning: 난 네가 대기만성형이라고 생각해.

items.text: Thanks, I'm so flattered.
items.meaning: 고마워. 너무 과찬이다.

items.text: Christmas is just around the corner.
items.meaning: 크리스마스가 코 앞으로 다가왔다.

items.text: I can't believe it's already the end of the year.
items.meaning: 벌써 연말이라니 믿을 수가 없어.

items.text: I deeply reflect on myself at this time of the year.
items.meaning: 일년 중 이맘 때면 나 자신을 깊이 되돌아보게 돼.

items.text: Come on. You're on the right track.
items.meaning: 무슨 소리. 넌 잘 하고 있어.

items.text: From now on, I'll try not to live in the past.
items.meaning: 지금부턴, 과거에 연연하지 않고 살려고 노력할거야.

items.text: OK, but you should take responsibility for your past.
items.meaning: 그래, 하지만 너의 과거에 대한 책임은 져야지.

items.text: Dinner is ready. Come and get it!
items.meaning: 저녁 준비됐다. 와서 먹어라!

items.text: I'll skip my dinner. I lost my appetite.
items.meaning: 전 저녁 건너 뛸래요. 입맛이 없어요.

items.text: You shouldn't have snacked before a meal.
items.meaning: 너 식사 전에 군것질 하지 말았어야지.

items.text: Mom, I think this soup tastes funny.
items.meaning: 엄마, 제 생각엔 수프 맛이 이상한 것 같아요.

items.text: OK, fine. Have it your way.
items.meaning: 그래, 알았다. 좋을 대로 해.

items.text: May I be excused?
items.meaning: 먼저 일어나도 되죠?

items.text: The tickets are almost sold out.
items.meaning: 표가 거의 다 매진되었네.

items.text: I want seats in the middle. I hate sitting on the sides.
items.meaning: 난 가운데 자리를 원해. 가장자리에 앉는 건 싫어.

items.text: Do you want some popcorn or drinks?
items.meaning: 팝콘이나 음료수 먹을래?

items.text: Sure. The show's about to start. Let's get in.
items.meaning: 물론이지. 쇼가 곧 시작하려고 해. 들어가자.

items.text: Nature calls me. Save my seat.
items.meaning: 화장실 가고 싶네. 자리 잡아 놔.

items.text: OK. I need to put my phone on vibrate.
items.meaning: 알았어. 휴대폰 진동으로 바꿔놓아야겠다.

items.text: Have you ever been to that new family restaurant?
items.meaning: 새로 생긴 패밀리 레스토랑 가 본 적 있어?

items.text: No. Do you think it's worth visiting?
items.meaning: 아니. 네 생각에 가 볼 가치가 있어?

items.text: Absolutely! You'll be sorry if you miss that place.
items.meaning: 당연하지! 그 장소 안 가보면 후회할 걸.

items.text: How did you learn of it?
items.meaning: 넌 거기 어떻게 알았어?

items.text: By word of mouth. A friend of mine told me.
items.meaning: 입소문으로 알았지. 내 친구 중 하나가 말해줬어.

items.text: What was the name of that place?
items.meaning: 식당 이름이 뭐라고 했지?

items.text: I'm really crazy about soccer lately.
items.meaning: 나 요즘 축구 경기에 완전히 미쳐있어.

items.text: Which team are you rooting for?
items.meaning: 어느 팀을 응원하는데?

items.text: Chelsea. They came from behind and won 3 to 1 today.
items.meaning: 첼시. 오늘은 역전해서 3대1로 이겼어

items.text: I guess your team is on a winning streak.
items.meaning: 내 추측엔 너희 팀이 연승을 하고 있구나.

items.text: Yeah. That's the ninth win in a row already.
items.meaning: 그래. 벌써 9연승째야.

items.text: My team's game ended in a tie.
items.meaning: 우리 팀은 무승부로 끝났어.

items.text: How long does it take to reach the top?
items.meaning: 정상까지 가는 데 얼마나 걸려요?

items.text: We're almost there. Just hang in there.
items.meaning: 거의 다 왔어요. 조금만 참아요.

items.text: I can't go any further. I'm feeling a little queasy.
items.meaning: 더 못 가겠어요. 속이 울렁거려요.

items.text: OK. Let's get some rest and catch our breath.
items.meaning: 좋아요. 잠시 쉬면서 숨 좀 돌리죠.

items.text: Just a minute. I need to tie my shoes.
items.meaning: 잠시만요. 신발 끈 좀 묶을게요.

items.text: You're breaking in your new shoes.
items.meaning: 새 신발을 길들이고 있군요.

items.text: I ran into my ex-girlfriend on the street yesterday.
items.meaning: 나 어제 예전 여자친구와 우연히 마주쳤어.

items.text: Wow! Don’t tell me you chickened out.
items.meaning: 와우! 설마 너 겁먹고 도망친 건 아니지?

items.text: I almost sprained my ankle while stepping backwards.
items.meaning: 뒷걸음치다 발목을 거의 삐끗할 뻔했어.

items.text: You should take your mind off her.
items.meaning: 너 그녀를 마음에서 떨쳐버려야 해.

items.text: Yeah. I think it's time to pull myself together.
items.meaning: 그래. 이제 마음을 다잡을 때라고 생각해.

items.text: Don't worry. I think you can manage.
items.meaning: 걱정 마. 넌 잘 할 수 있을 거야.

items.text: She has a big mouth. She can't keep a secret.
items.meaning: 그녀는 말이 많아. 그녀는 비밀을 못 지켜.

items.text: That's why you give her the cold shoulder, right?
items.meaning: 그래서 네가 그녀에게 차갑게 대하는 거구나.

items.text: What would you do if you were in my shoes?
items.meaning: 네가 내 입장이라면 넌 어떻게 할래?

items.text: Well, I haven't given it a lot of thought.
items.meaning: 글쎄, 생각을 많이 안 해봤는데.

items.text: Anyway, she's kind of a pain in the neck.
items.meaning: 어쨌든, 그녀는 정말 골칫거리야.

items.text: I'm sorry to hear that.
items.meaning: 정말 안됐구나.

items.text: Sorry for disturbing you on your day off.
items.meaning: 당신 쉬는 날 방해해서 죄송해요.

items.text: Please make it short. I can't talk long.
items.meaning: 제발 짧게 해주세요. 통화 길게 못해요.

items.text: I'm calling to ask you for your advice. You have a minute?
items.meaning: 당신의 조언을 구하려고 전화했어요. 시간 좀 있으세요?

items.text: It's a bad time. Actually, I have company now.
items.meaning: 곤란해요(나쁜 시간).사실은 지금 손님이 있어요.

items.text: OK. Please let me know if you can free up some time.
items.meaning: 알았어요. 시간 낼 수 있으실 때 알려주세요.

items.text: How about if we meet in about an hour?
items.meaning: 한 시간쯤 후에 만나는 건 어때요?

items.text: I think I'm on a tight budget today.
items.meaning: 오늘 예산이 좀 빠듯한 것 같아

items.text: You paid last time, so it's my turn.
items.meaning: 저번엔 네가 계산했으니까 이번엔 내 차례야.

items.text: If you insist, why don't we split the bill?
items.meaning: 정 그렇다면, 나눠서 내는 건 어때?

items.text: Sure. Let's chip in about five dollars each.
items.meaning: 물론. 대략 5달럴씩 더 걷자.

items.text: OK. Here you go. Can I have a doggy bag, please?
items.meaning: 그래. 여기 있어. 여기 남은 음씩 싸 주실래요?

items.text: Excuse me, but would you call a designated driver?
items.meaning: 실례지만, 대리운전 불러 주실래요?

items.text: I think I have a crush on Kate.
items.meaning: 내 생각에 나 케이트한테 반한 것 같아.

items.text: Rumor has it she's taken. But why not give it a try?
items.meaning: 소문에 그녀는 임자가 있데. 그래도 시도는 한번 해보지?

items.text: I can't work up the courage. I'm not much of a talker.
items.meaning: 용기를 낼 수가 없어. 난 말주변도 없잖아.

items.text: Don't be so hard on yourself. You're a nice guy.
items.meaning: 너무 자책하지마. 넌 괜찮은 녀석이야.

items.text: Just between you and me, I'll try to pick her up.
items.meaning: 우리끼리 얘기인데, 그녀를 한 번 꼬셔볼게.(노력해볼게)

items.text: That's the spirit! I'll keep my fingers crossed.
items.meaning: 바로 그 정신이야! 내가 행운을 빌어줄게.

items.text: Telegram is all the rage among Korean people.
items.meaning: 텔레그램이 한국인들 사이에서 정말 인기야.

items.text: Call me old-fashioned, but I don't use Telegram.
items.meaning: 날 구식이라 부르겠지만, 난 텔레그램 안 해.

items.text: You don't wanna do that. People would play you for a fool.
items.meaning: 그러지 않는게 좋을 거야. 사람들이 바보 취급 할 수도 있어.

items.text: No wonder they weren't answering my texts.
items.meaning: 어쩐지 내 문자에 답장을 안 하더라고.

items.text: You can download the app online. You can't miss it.
items.meaning: 온라인에서 다운로드 받을 수 있어. 찾기 쉬워.

items.text: I see your point, but what's the big deal?
items.meaning: 무슨 말인지 알았어. 근데 뭐 대단한 거라고.

items.text: I woke up with a stiff neck. I'm not feeling like myself.
items.meaning: 나 자고 일어났더니 목이 뻐근해. 내 몸 같지가 않아.

items.text: You drank till you dropped last night.
items.meaning: 너 어젯밤에 나가 떨어질 때까지 마셨구나.

items.text: To top it off, I think I left my phone in the taxi.
items.meaning: 설상가상으로, 내 생각에 택시에 내 전화기를 두고 내렸나 봐.

items.text: You remind me of a friend of mine from university.
items.meaning: 널 보니 대학교 친구 중 한 녀석이 생각난다.

items.text: He must be a real party animal.
items.meaning: 그도 파티광이 분명했나 보네.

items.text: He blacked out and even threw up sometimes.
items.meaning: 그는 필름도 끊겼고 가끔 토하기도 했지.

items.text: Let's make a toast to your success. Bottoms up!
items.meaning: 너의 성공을 위해 건배하자. 원 샷!

items.text: I must not drink today. I'm on medication.
items.meaning: 오늘 나 술 마시면 안 돼. 약 먹고 있거든.

items.text: Come on. I'm not falling for that trick.
items.meaning: 왜 이래. 나는 그런 속임수에 안 넘어가.

items.text: I have a bad cold and ache all over.
items.meaning: 나 심한 감기에 몸살까지 있어.

items.text: Why don’t you take a day off and relax?
items.meaning: 하루 휴가 내고 쉬지 그래?

items.text: I'd love to, but I'm tied up at work.
items.meaning: 그러고 싶어, 그런데 일 때문에 꼼짝 못해.

items.text: How did you get into an accident?
items.meaning: 어쩌다가 사고가 났어?

items.text: A man crashed into my car and ran away.
items.meaning: 한 남자가 내 차를 박고 도망갔어.

items.text: That was close. Did you figure out who did that?
items.meaning: 큰일 날 뻔했네. 누가 그랬는지 알아냈어?

items.text: Yes. But he was trying to put the blame on me.
items.meaning: 응. 근데 그 사람이 나한테 책임을 돌리려 하더라고.

items.text: You're out of luck today. Hope it works out for you.
items.meaning: 너 오늘 운이 없는 날이구나. 잘 해결되길 바라.

items.text: I was so upset. I almost burst into tears.
items.meaning: 나 너무 속상했어. 거의 눈물이 터질 뻔 했다니까.

items.text: Have you made a profit on your house?
items.meaning: 집으로 수익을 좀 냈어?

items.text: Just getting by. I just broke even.
items.meaning: 그럭저럭 버티고 있지. 겨우 본전이야.

items.text: I'm thinking of taking out a loan from the bank.
items.meaning: 은행에서 대출을 받을까 생각 중이야.

items.text: Can you recommend a new area to invest in?
items.meaning: 새로운 투자처 좀 추천해 줄 수 있어?

items.text: I have my own problems. I'm busy paying off a debt.
items.meaning: 내 코가 석자야. 빚 갚느라 정신이 없어.

items.text: We're in the same boat. I'm struggling to raise money.
items.meaning: 우리 같은 배를 탔네(같은처지). 나도 돈 마련하려고 애쓰는 중이야.

items.text: I heard your wife was hospitalized last night.
items.meaning: 내가 듣기론 지난 밤에 네 부인이 입원했다면서.

items.text: She was in a coma when she was taken to the ER.
items.meaning: 그녀가 응급실에 실려갔을 때 혼수상태였어.

items.text: I hope she'll be released from the hospital soon.
items.meaning: 그녀가 곧 퇴원하길 바라.

items.text: After the surgery, she is in stable condition now.
items.meaning: 수술 후에, 그녀는 지금 안정된 상태야.

items.text: What did the doctor say? Is she all right?
items.meaning: 의사가 뭐래? 그녀 괜찮데?

items.text: He said she should bring her cholesterol level down.
items.meaning: 그가 말하길 그녀가 콜레스테롤 수치를 낮춰야 한데.

items.text: Congratulations! Your book is selling like hotcakes.
items.meaning: 축해해요! 당신 책이 불티나게 팔리고 있어요.

items.text: Thanks. Please spread the word for me.
items.meaning: 고마워요. 제발 절 위해 입소문 좀 내주세요.

items.text: Sure. You have a way to promote it to the public.
items.meaning: 물론이죠. 당신 대중에게 홍보하는 방법이 있나요?

items.text: Yes. I've been posting free lectures on my site.
items.meaning: 네. 제 사이트에 무료 강의를 올려왔어요.

items.text: I'll put in a good word to my friends and acquaintances.
items.meaning: 제가 친구들과 지인들한테 얘기 잘 해 줄게요.

items.text: Thanks a million. That means a lot to me.
items.meaning: 정말 고마워요. 정말 큰 힘(의미)가 되요.

items.text: I think it's too much for me to play golf.
items.meaning: 내 생각에 골프 치는 건 내겐 너무 벅차.

items.text: Once you get the hang of it, it's just a matter of time.
items.meaning: 일단 감을 잡으면, 그건 단지 시간문제야.

items.text: Would it be possible to catch up with you in a year?
items.meaning: 1년 안에 널 따라잡는 게 가능할까?

items.text: I guess so. For starters, try to get used to it.
items.meaning: 아마도. 우선은, 익숙해지려고 노력해 봐.

items.text: All the practice will pay off in the near future.
items.meaning: 열심히 연습하면 가까운 미래에 성과가 있을 거야.

items.text: It's always easier said than done.
items.meaning: 항상 말이야 행동보다 쉽지.

items.text: Hey, I'm back. What did I miss?
items.meaning: 이봐, 나 돌아왔어. (나 없을 때)무슨 얘기 했어?

items.text: Guess what I just heard? Take a guess.
items.meaning: 방금 무슨 얘기 들었는지 맞춰 봐. 한번 맞춰 봐.

items.text: What do you take me for? Give it to me straight.
items.meaning: 날 뭐로 보는 거야? 솔직히 말해.

items.text: They got carried away and kissed each other.
items.meaning: 걔네들 분위기에 휩쓸려서 서로 키스했대.

items.text: I knew it! They were drinking a lot.
items.meaning: 그럴 줄 알았어! 걔네들 술 엄청 마시더라.

items.text: I think they're made for each other.
items.meaning: 내 생각에 걔네들 천생연분인 것 같아.

items.text: You didn't come out great in this picture.
items.meaning: 이 사진에는 당신이 잘 안 나왔네요.

items.text: To be honest, I'm a little camera-shy.
items.meaning: 솔직히 전 사진 찍는 거 싫어해요.

items.text: You look better than your picture.
items.meaning: 당신은 사진보다 실물이 나아요.

items.text: That's what everybody tells me.
items.meaning: 다들 저한테 그렇게 말해요.

items.text: You'd better change your mind and have confidence.
items.meaning: 당신의 생각을 바꾸고 자신감을 가지는 게 좋겠어요.

items.text: On second thought, you have a point.
items.meaning: 다시 생각해 보니, 당신 말이 일리가 있네요.

items.text: Can I help you find something?
items.meaning: 뭐 찾으시는 거 도와드릴까요?

items.text: I'm wondering if you can give me a discount on this.
items.meaning: 이거 할인해 주실 수 있는지 궁금해요.

items.text: That's a steal. We're selling these at cost.
items.meaning: 완전 공짜나 다름없어요. 우리 이것들을 원가에 팔고 있는 거에요.

items.text: I don’t like to haggle, but it's way too expensive.
items.meaning: 흥정하고 싶진 않지만, 너무 비싸네요.

items.text: Why don't you try it on for size?
items.meaning: 사이즈 맞는지 한 번 입어 보심 어때요?

items.text: If you can't come down, let me sleep on it.
items.meaning: 깎아 줄 수 없다면, 생각 좀 해볼게요.

items.text: This work is beyond my ability. I'm not sure if I can do it.
items.meaning: 이 일은 제 능력 밖이에요. 제가 할 수 있을지 모르겠어요.

items.text: Stop beating around the bush. Just get to the point.
items.meaning: 말 돌리지 마세요. 본론만 얘기해요.

items.text: I'm pulling my weight. I deserve a raise.
items.meaning: 전 제 역할을 다하고 있어요. 급여 인상을 받을 자격이 있다고요.

items.text: Pay raise? Don't start with that again.
items.meaning: 급여 인상이요? 그 얘긴 꺼내지도 마세요.

items.text: I'm going to put in for a transfer to another division.
items.meaning: 타 부서로 전근 신청할 거에요.

items.text: Please stop pressuring me. You're driving me crazy.
items.meaning: 나 그만 괴롭혀요. 당신 때문에 미치겠어요.

items.text: Look outside! It's pouring.
items.meaning: 바깥 좀 봐! 비가 억수로 쏟아지고 있어.

items.text: I don't feel like cooking. Let's send out for Chinese food.
items.meaning: 요리하고 싶지 않아. 중국 음식 배달시키자.

items.text: What's the weather going to be like tomorrow?
items.meaning: 내일 날씨는 어떨 것 같아?

items.text: There's a good chance it will rain in the afternoon.
items.meaning: 오후에 비 올 가능성이 높대

items.text: Too bad we have to be cooped up at home on Sunday.
items.meaning: 일요일에 집에 처박혀 있으려니 죽겠네.

items.text: Damn it! There goes my weekend.
items.meaning: 제길! 내 주말은 망했어.

items.text: Do you have any big plans this Saturday?
items.meaning: 이번 주 토요일에 특별한 계획이 있어?

items.text: I'm afraid I have some work to catch up on.
items.meaning: 안타깝게도 밀린 일을 좀 해야 해.

items.text: You look really stressed out. What happened?
items.meaning: 너 정말 스트레스 받아 보여. 무슨 일이야?

items.text: The last thing I wanna do is fill in for someone.
items.meaning: 다른 사람을 대신하는 건 절대 하고 싶지 않은 일이야.

items.text: Stick it out and don't bite off more than you can chew.
items.meaning: 조금만 참아, 그리고 무리하지는 마

items.text: I can't stand the sight of him. Let's take a walk.
items.meaning: 그 녀석 꼴도 보기 싫어. 산책이나 하자

items.text: Would you mind backing up a little, please?
items.meaning: (차를) 뒤로 빼주실 수 있을까요?

items.text: What's the matter? I always park here.
items.meaning: 뭐가 문제죠? 저 항상 여기에 주차해요.

items.text: This is a tow-away-zone. You can get a parking ticket.
items.meaning: 여기는 (불법주차) 견인지역이에요. 주차위반 딱지를 받을 수도 있어요.

items.text: Don't make a big deal out of nothing.
items.meaning: 별거 아닌 일로 호들갑 떨지 마세요.

items.text: As far as I know, there's a parking lot behind the building.
items.meaning: 제가 알기로는 건물 뒤에 주차장이 있어요.

items.text: That's news to me. Thanks for the tip.
items.meaning: 금시초문이네요. 알려줘서 고마워요.

items.text: You look sharp today. What's going on?
items.meaning: 오늘 멋져 보이네. 무슨 일이야?

items.text: I treated myself to a new coat behind my wife's back.
items.meaning: 아내 몰래 큰 맘 먹고 새 코트 하나 샀지.

items.text: She'll blow her top if she finds out.
items.meaning: 그녀가 알면 불같이 화낼 거야.

items.text: Leave it to me. I'll take care of it.
items.meaning: 나한테 맡겨. 내가 알아서 할게.

items.text: I feel sorry for her. What kind of husband are you?
items.meaning: 난 네 아내가 안타깝다. 넌 어떤 남편인 거니?

items.text: Keep your voice down. Don't tell a soul.
items.meaning: 목소리 좀 낮춰. 아무한테도 말하지 마.

items.text: I got a lecture for failing to meet the deadline.
items.meaning: 나 마감시간을 못 지켜서 야단 맞았어.

items.text: You know how your boss is about deadlines.
items.meaning: 사장님이 마감일에 대해 어떤지 알잖아.

items.text: I don't want to let him down any more.
items.meaning: 이젠 더 이상 그를 실망시키고 싶지 않아.

items.text: Let's talk about it over a drink tonight.
items.meaning: 저녁에 한잔 하면서 얘기하자.

items.text: I got paid today. I'll treat you to dinner.
items.meaning: 오늘 월급 받았어. 내가 너 저녁 사줄게.

items.text: I owe you one. It’s my turn to return the favor.
items.meaning: 나 너한테 신세 진 게 있어. 내가 보답할 차례야.

items.text: We're running out of gas.
items.meaning: 기름이 떨어져 가고 있어.

items.text: I know a gas station on the way.
items.meaning: 가는 길에 주유소 알아.

items.text: While we're at it, I should get my car washed.
items.meaning: 하는 김에, 세차도 좀 해야겠다.

items.text: You have to make a left at the next light.
items.meaning: 다음 신호등에서 좌회전해야 해.

items.text: I need to fill up the tank. We have a long way to go.
items.meaning: 탱크에 (기름) 가득 채울 필요가 있겠다. 갈 길이 멀잖아.

items.text: Fill her up, please. Can I get a car wash?
items.meaning: 가득 넣어 주세요. 세차 가능할까요?

items.text: I've been out of touch with Jason for months.
items.meaning: 제이슨하고 몇 달째 연락이 끊겼어.

items.text: I've texted him a few times. He's in the doghouse.
items.meaning: 문자도 몇 번 보냈는데. 걔 완전 찍혔어.

items.text: Let's drop the subject and go out for lunch.
items.meaning: 그 얘긴 그만하고 점심이나 먹으러 가자.

items.text: Here comes the food. Let's dig in.
items.meaning: 음식 나왔다. 먹자.

items.text: The total comes to $24.
items.meaning: 총 24달러입니다.

items.text: Put it on my account, please.
items.meaning: 제 장부에 달아 주세요.

items.text: I have a reservation under the name of Jinsu Kim.
items.meaning: 김진수라는 이름으로 예약을 했는데요.

items.text: Yes, Sir. Could you fill out this form, please?
items.meaning: 네. 이 양식을 좀 작성해 주시겠습니까?

items.text: I'd like a room with an ocean view if possible.
items.meaning: 가능하면 바다가 보이는 방으로 주세요.

items.text: Let me check. Okay, we have one. Your room number is 902.
items.meaning: 확인해 보겠습니다. 네, 하나 있네요. 방 번호는 902호 입니다.

items.text: Great. Can you give me a wake-up call at 7:00?
items.meaning: 좋아요. 7시에 모닝콜 해주시겠어요?

items.text: Sure. I'll have a bellboy carry your luggage to your room.
items.meaning: 물론이죠. 벨보이가 짐을 객실로 옮겨드릴 겁니다.

items.text: Can I have an extra towel in my room, please?
items.meaning: 제 방에 여분의 수건 하나 더 주시겠어요?

items.text: What's the problem today?
items.meaning: 오늘은 어디가 문제인가요?

items.text: This is my first time here. I have a bad cough.
items.meaning: 여기 처음인데요. 기침이 심해요.

items.text: Leave your name and phone number, please.
items.meaning: 성함과 전화번호 남겨주세요.

items.text: OK. How many parties are ahead of me?
items.meaning: 네. 제 앞에 대기자가 몇 명인가요?

items.text: Do you want me to put you on the waiting list?
items.meaning: 대기자 명단에 올려드릴까요?

items.text: Yes, please. How long is the wait?
items.meaning: 네, 부탁해요. 얼마나 기다려야 하죠?

items.text: The way I see it, it should take 30 minutes.
items.meaning: 제가 보기엔, 30분 정도 걸릴 것 같아요.

items.text: Can I take your order? What can I get for you?
items.meaning: 주문 도와드릴까요? 뭘 드릴까요?

items.text: I'd like a cheese burger, french fries and a coke.
items.meaning: 전 치즈버거 한 개, 감자튀김, 콜라 하나 주세요.

items.text: For here or to go?
items.meaning: 여기서 드세요, 가져가세요?

items.text: To go, please. Take it easy on the onions.
items.meaning: 가져갑니다. 양파는 조금만 넣어 주세요.

items.text: Will that be all? That'll be $7.50. Enjoy your meal.
items.meaning: 그게 전부이신가요? 7달러 50센트입니다. 맛있게 드세요.

items.text: I'd like to pay by credit card. Here you go.
items.meaning: 카드로 계산할게요. 여기 있어요.

items.text: Do you have a reservation?
items.meaning: 예약하셨나요?

items.text: No. Do you have a table for five?
items.meaning: 아뇨, 5명 자리 있나요?

items.text: Certainly. Would you like a table or a booth?
items.meaning: 물론이죠. 테이블을 원하세요, 칸막이 쪽을 원하세요?

items.text: We'd like to sit in a booth. What do you say, honey?
items.meaning: 칸막이에 앉을게요. 당신은 어때요, 여보?

items.text: It's all the same to me. Suit yourself.
items.meaning: 전 아무래도 괜찮아요. 편할 대로 해요.

items.text: Boys, please stay out of trouble and behave yourselves.
items.meaning: 얘들아, 말썽 피우지 말고 얌전히 있어라.

items.text: Good afternoon. How may I help you?
items.meaning: (오후)안녕하세요. 뭘 도와드릴까요?

items.text: Can I get a refund on this coat?
items.meaning: 이 코트 환불 받을 수 있을까요?

items.text: I'm afraid it's against our policy to give refunds.
items.meaning: 유감스럽게도 환불은 규정에 어긋납니다.

items.text: This is torn. Can I exchange it for another one?
items.meaning: 이게 찢어졌어요. 다른 걸로 교환 받을 수 있을까요?

items.text: All sales are final. We’re sorry for the inconvenience.
items.meaning: 환불/교환 불가입니다. 불편을 드려 죄송합니다.

items.text: I'm so fed up with your service.
items.meaning: 당신네 서비스에 완전 질렸어요.

items.text: Who came up with this brilliant idea?
items.meaning: 누가 이렇게 훌륭한 아이디어를 생각해 냈죠?

items.text: We put our heads together to solve the problem.
items.meaning: 우리가 머리를 맞대고 문제를 해결했어요.

items.text: Good job. Let's give ourselves a big hand.
items.meaning: 잘했어요. 모두에게 큰 박수를 쳐 줍시다.

items.text: Why don't you report it to the boss right away?
items.meaning: 사장님께 바로 보고 드리는 건 어때요?

items.text: He's in a bad mood today. Don't ask for trouble.
items.meaning: 그가 오늘 기분이 안 좋아요. 괜한 짓 하지 마세요.

items.text: Really? I was barking up the wrong tree.
items.meaning: 정말요? 제가 잘못 짚었네요.

items.text: My father passed away last week.
items.meaning: 지난주에 아버지가 돌아가셨어요.

items.text: I'm so sorry for your loss. I know how you feel.
items.meaning: 삼가 조의를 표합니다. 어떤 심정인지 알아요.

items.text: Thank you for your sympathy.
items.meaning: 위로해 주셔서 감사해요.

items.text: He was a great man. He had a mind of his own.
items.meaning: 그는 훌륭한 분이셨죠. 그는 주관이 뚜렷하셨어요.

items.text: He had to learn the hard way and made it big.
items.meaning: 그는 역경을 통해 배워야 했고, 성공하셨어요.

items.text: I've looked up to him since I was young.
items.meaning: 전 어렸을 때부터 그 분을 존경했어요.

items.text: The economy is worse now more than ever.
items.meaning: 지금 경기가 그 어느 때보다 좋지 않아

items.text: The job market is horrible to say the least.
items.meaning: 일자리 시장은 조금도 과장 없이 최악이야.

items.text: Big companies don't place many ads to hire people.
items.meaning: 대기업에서 채용 공고를 많이 내지 않아.

items.text: Some say we have to lower our standards.
items.meaning: 어떤 이들은 우리에게 눈높이를 낮추라고 해.

items.text: I think everyone has what it takes to succeed.
items.meaning: 난 누구나 성공에 필요한 자질이 있다고 생각해.

items.text: Let's face it. It's too cut-throat these days.
items.meaning: 현실을 직시하자. 요즘 경쟁이 너무 치열하다고.

items.text: Did you get good grades in school?
items.meaning: 학교 다닐 때 공부 잘했어?

items.text: Looking back, I was on the dean's list during college.
items.meaning: 돌이켜 보니, 대학 다닐 때, 나 우등생 명단에 있었지.

items.text: You were an honor student? Don't make me laugh.
items.meaning: 네가 모범생이었다고? 웃기지 마.

items.text: OK, but good grades don't put food on the table.
items.meaning: 알았어, 하지만 좋은 성적이 밥 먹여 주는 건 아니잖아.

items.text: There's nothing like studying hard as a student.
items.meaning: 학생 때는 공부를 열심히 하는 게 최고지.

items.text: I think the point is that I missed the boat in life.
items.meaning: 핵심은 내가 인생의 기회를 놓쳤다는 거지.

items.text: Let's go ahead with this plan. We can manage.
items.meaning: 이 계획 추진하자. 그럭저럭 해낼 수 있어.

items.text: With your track record, I don't think we can pull it off.
items.meaning: 너의 전적을 봐서는, 내 생각에 우린 못할 것 같아.

items.text: Come on! Don't be such a chicken!
items.meaning: 왜 이래! 겁쟁이처럼 굴지 마.

items.text: All I'm saying is we need something to turn to.
items.meaning: 내 말은 우리 기댈 수 있는 뭔가가 필요해.

items.text: OK. If you insist, let's meet halfway.
items.meaning: 좋아. 정 그렇다면, 절반씩 양보하자.

items.text: Be serious. It's no laughing matter.
items.meaning: 좀 진지하라고. 웃을 일이 아니야.
